person.name: Van Darkholme
person.about: Van's full stage name is Van Darkholm, but as his real name has never been revealed, he is popularly known simply as Van. Born in Vietnam, Van is a well-known action actor and director in western philosophical films. In the 1990s, due to his physique, he also served as a fashion model.
